content:
本件保存七年
C2-62- 2491 MEMO
August 14, 2
To
: Mr. R. L. Hirshberg, Program Officer, US AID/C
From
: C. C. Chang, Chief, Second Division Original signed by C. C. Chang
Subject
: Excess Equipment
THE requested acquisition of two jeeps (7, ton 4x4 Willys 38A1) located at Linkou Base, which according to information given by Mr. De Vore are being declared excess and are available for acquisition. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition.

paragraphs.content: : Mr. R. L. Hirshberg, Program Officer, US AID/C
: C. C. Chang, Chief, Second Division Original signed by C. C. Chang

THE requested acquisition of two jeeps (7, ton 4x4 Willys 38A1) located at Linkou Base, which according to information given by Mr. De Vore are being declared excess and are available for acquisition. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition.
